text: Simmering is a method of cooking in water, where the temperature is kept just below that where the water would boil. The temperature at which this is achieved is around . To bring water to the point where it simmers, you first heat the water to boiling point, which is , then reduce the heat so that the bubbles on top of the water have almost stopped. == Uses for simmering == * Chocolate can be melted in a bowl over simmering water. * Dumplings are cooked in simmering water to stop them breaking up. ==Related pages== * Boiling Category:Cooking methods
